comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: This would be Ludwig III of Bavaria. I'm having trouble identifying "Excellencz von Strantz."

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: I"m going to go with the guy on the right as Gen. Hermann von Strantz, then a German military commander on the Western Front. de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hermann_von_Strantz Also, it seems the German generals were referred to as "Your Excellency", even by the Kaiser: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E02E3D71539E333A...

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you. We'll fill in the names the next time we update the record.
